settings.text: We always want you to be happy with your Jones Road Beauty purchase. Didn't find the perfect shade? Don't worry. Just contact us at hi@jonesroadbeauty.com, and we'll streamline the exchange process for you. If you'd rather a refund, that's absolutely fine too.

settings.heading: Feel confident shopping at Jones Road Beauty with our convenient returns and exchanges.

settings.description:
You have 30 days from purchase
to return your items.

You have 45 days from purchase
to exchange your items.

settings.text: Select kits, sets, and limited-edition products are final sale and excluded from returns and exchanges. Apparel is final sale.
Please note: Returns or exchanges may be limited based on misuse or bulk purchases. Restocking fees may apply. Shipping charges are non-refundable. Learn more about our terms and conditions here.

settings.heading: Visit the Returns Portal:
settings.description: To process a return or exchange, please go to our Jones Road Beauty Returns and Exchanges Portal. Please enter your order number and associated shipping zip code directly into the portal. Returns are accepted within 30 days. For EU orders over €140, a €6.95 (or local currency equivalent) restocking fee applies per return and will be deducted from your refund

settings.heading: Select Your Option:
settings.description: Pick whether it’s a return or exchange, answer a few easy questions, and your shipping label is ready.

settings.heading: Pack & Ship:
settings.description: If prompted to return your items, pack them in a box and attach the shipping label. Hand it over to your carrier, and we'll take care of the rest.

settings.heading: How do gift returns or exchanges work?
settings.description: To process a return or exchange for product(s) received as a gift, please head to the Jones Road beauty Returns and Exchanges Portal. Enter the order number and associated shipping zip code. Returns are accepted within 30 days. For EU orders over €140, a €6.95 (or local currency equivalent) restocking fee applies per return and will be deducted from your refund.

settings.heading: How long does it take to process a return?
settings.description: We're dedicated to processing your requests as quickly as possible. You'll receive an email confirmation once the exchange or refund has been initiated, generally within 24 hours or less.

settings.heading: What should I do if I bought the wrong shade?
settings.description: Our makeup artist team is happy to help you find your perfect routine customized to your unique skin tone and type. Reach out to hi@jonesroadbeauty.com within the 45-day timeframe for a free consultation and make your exchange.

settings.heading: Still Need Help?
settings.description: Have questions about our products, shade matching, order status, or returns? We're here to help! Just reach out to our Customer Support team here.

settings.heading: Holiday Shipping
settings.description:
Shipping carriers, inventory, and other factors may cause unforeseen shipping delays. Orders containing fragrances or other hazmat items are subject to shipping restrictions and may require specific shipping methods, which can affect delivery timing. For best results, place orders by the following cut-off dates for your region:

  • US - Standard Shipping: 12/14
  • US - Faster Shipping: 12/18
  • US - Fastest Shipping: 12/19
  • Australia: 12/10
  • Canada: 12/12
  • EU: 12/12
  • New Zealand: 12/13
  • UK: 12/14

settings.review: The returns process was so easy, and the customer service was fantastic!
settings.author: Jane D.

settings.review: I got the wrong shade, but exchanging it was a breeze. Love JRB!
settings.author: Michelle S.

settings.heading: Don’t Just Take Our Word For It
Take our Shade Matching Quizzes
settings.description: Find your shade by taking one of our quizzes, created by Bobbi.

settings.heading: Get Matched by a Makeup Artist
settings.description: Take a makeup-free selfie and send to hi@jonesroadbeauty.com.

settings.heading: Explore all our Products
settings.description: Check out our range to discover the right product for you.
